chapter.title: Payment Options
chapter.para: onCourse makes online sales simple with a range of payment options for enrolling students. With a complete shopping cart students can enrol in multiple classes in a single transaction, enrol a friend or with your approval send the invoice to their employer.

onCourse eCommerce doesn't handle only enrolments; it also includes product, memberships and gift voucher sales allowing you to diversify your business and the way people can buy and share your products.

section.title: Credit card
section.para: Real-time credit card processing ensures that successful enrolments are only made when the money is in your account.

caption.para: Using a credit card when paying for an enrolment

section.title: Corporate Pass
section.para: CorporatePass gives approved users the ability to invoice their employer on enrolment. That way you can develop a close relationship with your corporate customers, but still allow their staff to select training timetables to suit themselves.

caption.para: Using a CorporatePass code to complete an online enrolment without the need of any payment at that time

section.title: Vouchers and Gift Certificates
section.para: Vouchers are much more than a simple gift voucher. They can be used to sell training in flexible groups whether it be a sampler of arts courses or OH&S training for 20 co-workers.

caption.para: Adding a Voucher or Gift Certifcate to help pay for an online enrolment/s

section.title: Discounts and Promotional Codes
section.para: A range of flexible discounting and promotional code tools allow for students to access your special enrolment rates right up until the point of payment.

section.title: Concessions/Memberships
section.para: With onCourse memberships for individuals or employers, you can offer special prices to your select members or create a gym membership style training programme. Memberships can be sold or give away, and expire whenever you choose. You can add a concession or membership in th summary section whilst enrolling online. A '+' symbol with text 'Add Concession' can be found below you name and email address.
